name: 凯利·多诺万
birth_place: 美国,加利福尼亚州,洛杉矶

last_movies.title: 吸血鬼猎人巴菲 第一季
基情二加一 第一季

introduction: 凯利多诺万生于1971年4月12日,他的哥哥尼古拉斯·布兰登比他早三分钟。他开始他的职业生涯在幕后。他是一个独立的公共广播电影被称为残酷的事实(1994)和梳妆台集合了《吸血鬼猎人巴菲》(1997)。凯利一直热爱表演,并决定追求他最初的梦想和步骤在镜头面前。他的第一个打破世界的娱乐是他的小角色在城市人(1997)。几个月之后,他做了一个客人出现在MTV的深夜节目脱衣服(1999)。突出,不过,当他描绘“Xander哈里斯”双在《吸血鬼猎人巴菲》(1997)。他的客人在“巴菲”后,他继续为他的哥哥做stuntwork和还在幕后艺术部门。目前,凯利仍然stuntwork各种电视连续剧,最近被别名(2001)。Kelly Donovan was born on April 12, 1971 three minutes before his brother, Nicholas Brendon. He started his career behind the scenes. He was a P.A. on an independent movie called The Hard Truth (1994) and was the set dresser for Buffy the Vampire Slayer (1997). Kelly always had a passion for acting, though, and decided to pursue his original dream and step in front of the camera. His first break in the world of entertainment was his small role in City Guys (1997). Months afterwards, he made a guest appearance on MTV's late night program Undressed (1999). The highlight, though, was when he portrayed "Xander Harris"' double on Buffy the Vampire Slayer (1997). After his guest spot on "Buffy", he continued doing stuntwork for his brother and also worked behind the scenes in the Art Department. Currently, Kelly still does stuntwork for various television series, the most recent being Alias (2001).
